Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-lad
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: cng kl̀āw t̄heid (muḥạmmạd) k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ k̄hx khwām khûmkhrxng t̀x phracêā h̄æ̀ng mnus̄ʹychāti
H̄ı̂ pĥn cāk khwām chạ̀w r̂āy k̄hxng p̄hū̂ krasibkrasāb thī̀ h̄lxkl̀x
thī̀ krasibkrasāb nı h̄ạwxk k̄hxng mnus̄ʹy̒
